biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Brandy Lee Ledford (born February 4, 1969) is an American actress, model and former Penthouse Pet of the Year. She played the role of Doyle in the science fiction TV series Andromeda. Ledford is a devout Christian who describes Jesus as "the greatest love of my life".
